item.title: The Bhutan Odyssey: The Land of the Thunder Dragon
item.description:
Beyond the Border Gate

The journey didn’t start in Bhutan. It started with the rhythmic clatter of the Delhi-Dibrugarh Rajdhani and the humid, buzzing energy of the Siliguri markets. For days, the journey was a sequence of transitsâ€”the rush of Gurgaon, the long rails through the heart of India, and the construction-heavy roads of Sevoke and Bagdogra.
